label: 藤原忠通
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1097-1164). Son of Tadazane. Older brother of Yorinaga 頼長 (1120-1156). Regent (1123-1129; 1141-1150), Chancellor (1121-1123; 1129-1141; 1150-1158). Also known as Hossho-ji nyudo denka 法性寺入道殿下 (the Lay priest of the Hossho-ji"). Kanshi collection Hossho-ji kanpaku gyoshu. Private waka collection Tadamichi shu. Diary Hossho-ji kanpaku ki (no text edition available). Presumed sponsor of the Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩. Sponsor of the Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集. Hosted several poetry contests. [忠実、漢詩、法性寺関白御集、和歌、忠通集、法性寺関白記]"
